titles.title: Audrey Nerenberg Act
To amend the Missing Children's Assistance Act to extend the applicability of such Act to individuals determined to have a mental capacity less than 18 years of age.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Youth and Families.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 9/14/2000--Introduced. Audrey Nerenberg Act - Amends the Missing Children's Assistance Act to include within the definition of "child" under such Act an individual whose mental capacity is less than 18 years of age as determined by an appropriate medical authority.
